name: Aya Shobon Style - LoRA
description:
Please, check the description, there is plenty of useful information.

Indroduction:

This lora is supposed to represent Aya Shobon's artstyle and some concepts.

Model used for previews: DivineEleganceMix V4

Embeddings used for preview: EasyNegative and Bad-Hands-3

Artist's main features:

  • Monstrous futanari penises

  • Somehow normal futanari penises

  • Saggy / Perky breasts

  • Twitching Testicles (TBD)

Recommendations:

  • 1.0 - 0.8 weight for most models

  • See relevant tag tips

Two last pictures was made with Veiny Penis LoRA at 0.5 and 0.3 weight just for testing.
I'd also recommend that LoRA at 0.3 weight for using alongside with 1st version of Aya's LoRA. Results are significantly better in my opinion. Further versions of Aya's LoRA would be better (i hope).

Relevant genital tag tips:

You can adjust tag weights by placing it in brackets and specify value, like (Bulge:1.4), where 1.4 is modifier. Base tag weight is 1.0 when you're putting it in your prompt box.

So, Large Erect Penis and (Large Erect Penis:1.4) would produce different size of schlongs. The secound one also can be much bigger or equal to Huge Penis.

Things that works pretty well:

  • Erection | (Size) Erect Penis | Flaccid | (Size) Flaccid Penis for penis state

    • (Size) value could be Small | Large | Huge or Gigantic

  • Large | Huge | Gigantic Penis for penis size

  • Large | Huge | Gigantic Testicles for testicles size

  • Sagging | Resting Testicles for testicles state

    • Sagging for saggy testicles

    • Resting for on-surface state while sitting (like breast rest)

  • Futanari + Bulge for bulges (nothing more needed)

  • Female Pubic Hair | Excessive Pubic Hair | for pubes

Things that works somehow:

  • (Size) Semi-Erect Penis | (Size) Floppy Penis for penis state

    • Actually the same tag, the second one not to match danbooru tags

  • Full-Package Futanari | Futanari + Pussy for penis and pussy

    • Might be useful for From Behind view

  • Backsack for testicles from behind

    • Might be useful for From Behind view

Complete RNG right now (not working or planned features):

  • Autofellatio | Autopaizuri for corresponding acts

  • Urethral Insertion | Urethral Bulge | Urethral Beadingfor some extreme acts

  • Twitching Testiclesfor uhh...

    • Well, you'll got me, if you know Aya's artwork

LoRA won't produce futas all the time (just don't prompt futa/penis), so you could generate regular clohed or naked girls.

Credits:

Trained on NAI Anime Full. Dataset of 180 pictures. 8 Epochs. Clip Skip - 2.

Really BIG | LARGE | HUGE | GIGANTIC thanks to:

  • Aya Shobon for beautiful artwork

  • Some good folks from Discord server

  • You, for reading, downloading and reviewing this LoRA
